attributes.action: The UK should apply to join the European Economic Area (EEA).
attributes.additional_details:
Referees:
Duncan Turner - Duncan.turner@prepaysolutions.com
Garry Comley - Garry.comley@prepaysolutions.com
Aslam Ghauri - Aslam.ghauri@prepaysolutions.com
Sarah Bowsher - Sarah.bowsher@prepaysolutions.com
Paul Kerry - Paul.kerry@prepaysolutions.com
attributes.background: The UK Referendum on EU Membership resulted in a vote for the UK to leave the EU.  The UK could apply to become a member of the EEA. This could and should be presented to the UK population as a proposal to be determined by Referendum by June 2018.
